title: The Amazing Place
description: Twelve couples arrive on a tropical island and compete in daring and dangerous challenges for the chance to win $1,000,000.
quote: This is the greatest adventure to take place in just one place.
altHero: host Tug Tuckerbag next to some Tiki statues
alt1: man being pulled into a low flying hot air balloon as sharks jump at him
alt2: it’s raining jellyfish and a guy is trying to pull one off his face
alt3: four couples are on a dock opposite the water from Tag Tuckerbag; giant lily pads float in the water in front of them
alt4: a couple celebrates in front of a big banner that says “$1,000,000”
